shortdesc.ph: Callback triggered when the local user publishes the first audio frame.
Callback when the first local audio frame is published.

section.p:
The SDK triggers this callback when any of the following conditions are met:
The local client enables the audio module and successfully calls joinChannel.
The local client calls muteLocalAudioStream(true) and then muteLocalAudioStream(false).
The local client calls and then .
The local client successfully pushes audio frames to the SDK using .

section.title: Trigger Timing
section.p:
This callback is triggered by the SDK under any of the following conditions:
The local client enables the audio module and successfully calls joinChannel.
The local client calls muteLocalAudioStream(true) followed by muteLocalAudioStream(false).
The local client calls followed by .
The local client successfully pushes audio frames to the SDK using .
This callback is triggered when the first local audio frame is published.

plentry.pd: Time elapsed (ms) from the local user calling joinChannel to the SDK triggering this callback.
Time interval (ms) from the local user calling joinChannel to the SDK triggering this callback.
